page.title: 07Shopping in Monmouth
page.content: In a survey we found that{shoppers were generally satisfied with the shops in the town.Younger shoppers were more critical and were inclined towards Newport,Cardiff or Gloucester for greater choice.There was an overwhelming demand for a store of the Marks and Spencer type. The{produce market}held on Fridays was used mainly by older shoppers for fresh vegetable and dairy products. There is a range of{unusual shops}of especial interest to{tourists.}Hand made toys,hand made children's clothes, a bakery, craftsman furniture in oak, Italian shoes, delicatessan, imported pastries and a coffee /tea shops.There is also a National Trust shop.
